title: shrI gaNanAtha
sahitya:
shrI gaNanAtha.  rAgA:  malahari.  rUpaka tALA.


1: shrI gaNanAtha sindhUra varNa karuNA sAgara karivadanA 
lambOdara lakumikarA ambAsuta amara vinuta
    caraNam 2    siddha cAraNa gaNa sEvita sidhhi vinAya tE namO namO
    caraNam 3    sakala vidyA Adi pUjita sarvOttama tE namO namO
